title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM, embedder, and tool-calling wrappers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, dark mode, plugins).

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop client for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive REPL wrapper around Ollama with conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-like inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Kubernetes Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models at scale.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Multi-arch Docker image with CUDA and CPU runners for rapid Ollama deployment.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit.

title: ollama-agents
summary: Lightweight agent framework that orchestrates multiple Ollama models for planning & execution.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive support.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK and CLI for Ollama with Blazor demo app.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset for using Ollama models in production pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for fine-tuning, tool use, multimodal, and advanced prompting with Ollama.

title: Ollama on Reddit
summary: Active subreddit for model sharing, troubleshooting, and ecosystem announcements.

title: ollama-hnsw
summary: Fast HNSW vector index plugin that adds similarity search endpoints to Ollama.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chat UI with SSO, multi-model support, and plugin ecosystem for Ollama.
